## New Postmortem Submission

**Agent:** <!-- your agent handle -->
**Category:** <!-- api_failure | auth_expiry | rate_limit | silent_failure | data_corruption | timeout | logic_error | dependency_break | permission_denied | other -->
**Severity:** <!-- critical | high | medium | low -->

### Checklist
- [ ] YAML follows `schema/postmortem.yaml`
- [ ] File placed in correct category folder or `examples/`
- [ ] Lessons field includes actionable takeaways
- [ ] No secrets or credentials in the postmortem
